resources.string: Android UI Kit
\u00A9 2022 CometChat Inc.
CometChatConversationsWithMessages is an independent component used to set up a screen that shows the recent conversations and allows you to send a message to the user or group from the list.
CometChatConversations is an independent component used to set up a screen that shows the recent conversations alone
CometChatConversationList component renders a scrollable list of all recent conversations in your app.
CometChatConversationListItem is a reusable component which is used to display the conversation list item in the conversation list.

CometChatGroupsWithMessages is an independent component used to set up a screen that shows the list of groups available in your app and gives you the ability to search for a specific group and to start a conversation.
CometChatGroups is an independent component used to set up a screen that displays the list of groups available in your app and gives you the ability to search for a specific group.
CometChatGroupList component renders a scrollable list of groups in your app.
The component is used to create a new group. Groups can of three types-public, private or password protected. To learn more about this component tap here.
CometChatDataItem is used to display the group list item in the group list. It houses the Avatar, Status indicator, Title and Subtitle.
This component is used to join a password protected group. to learn more about this component tap here.
This Component is used to view members in a group. To learn more about this component tap here.
This Component is used to add users to a group. To learn more about this component tap here.
This Component is used to transfer ownership of a group from one user to another. To learn more about this component tap here.
This component is used to Display banned members of a group. To learn more about this component tap here.
This component can be used to view information about a group to learn more this component tap here.

CometChatUsersWithMessages is an independent component used to set up a screen that shows the list of users available in your app and gives you the ability to search for a specific user and to start conversation.
CometChatUsers is an independent component used to set up a screen that displays a scrollable list of users available in your app and gives you the ability to search for a specific user.
This component can be used to view information about a user to learn more about this component tap here.
CometChatDataItem is used to display the user list item in a user list. It houses the Avatar, Status indicator and Title
Messages module helps you to send and receive in a conversation between a user or group. To learn more about its components click here.
CometChatMessageHeader is an independent component that displays the User or Group information using SDK\'s User or Group object.
CometChatMessageList displays a list of messages and handles real-time operations.
CometChatComposer is an independent and a critical component that allows users to compose and send various types of messages such as text, image, video and custom messages.
CometChatCallsHistory is an independent component used to set up a screen that shows the recent call logs and allows you to open details screen.
CometChatCallsHistory is an independent component used to set up a screen that shows the recent call logs .
CometChatCallsDetails is an independent component that will allows you make a call along with the users or group details.
CometChatCallButtons is an independent component that will allows you make a call.
CometChatAvatar component displays an image or user/group avatar with fallback to the first two letters of the user name/group name.
StatusIndicator component indicates whether a user is online or offline.
CometChatBadgeCount is a custom component which is used to display the unread message count. It can be used in places like ConversationListItem, etc.
CometChatMessageReceipt component renders the receipts such as sending, sent, delivered, read and error state indicator of a message.
CometChatListItem is a reusable component which is used across multiple components in different variations such as Users, Groups, Conversation, etc as a List item.
CometChatLocalize allows you to detect the language of your users based on their browser or device settings and set the language accordingly.
CometChatLocalize आपको अपने ब्राउज़र या डिवाइस सेटिंग्स के आधार पर अपने उपयोगकर्ताओं की भाषा का पता लगाने और उसके अनुसार भाषा सेट करने की अनुमति देता है।
Language
भाषा
हिन्दी
देखें
View
CometChatSoundManager allows you to play different types of audio which is required for incoming and outgoing events in UI Kit. for example, events like incoming and outgoing messages.
CometChatTheme is a style applied to every component and every view in the activity or component in the UI Kit.
Fill this field
Messages module helps you to send and receive in a conversation between a user or group. To learn more about its components click here.
Groups module helps you list all the groups you are part of in your app. To learn more about its components click here.
Calls module helps you to list the recent call history between your users and groups. To learn more about this component click here.
Conversations module helps you to list the recent conversations between your users and groups. To learn more about its components click here.
Users module helps you list all the users available in your app. To learn more about its components click here.
Share module contains several reusable components that are divided into Primary, Secondary and SDK derived components. To learn more about these components click here.
CometChatListItem displays data on a title and that tile may contain leading, trailing, title and subtitle widgets. To learn more about this component tap here.
CometChatFileBubble displays a media message containing a file to learn more about this component tap here.
CometChatAudioBubble displays a media message containing a audio to learn more about this component tap here.
CometChatImageBubble displays a media message containing a image to learn more about this component tap here.
CometChatVideoBubble displays a media message containing a video to learn more about this component tap here.
CometChatTextBubble displays text message to learn more about this component tap here.

The CometChatMediaRecorder is a custom Android component that provides a user interface for recording audio and playing back the recorded audio. It is designed to be easily integrated into chat applications or other projects where audio messaging is required.

CometChatContacts is a versatile UI component specifically designed to streamlines the process of showcasing all app users and available chat groups in a user-friendly interface, making it easier for users to connect and communicate effectively.

The CometChatMessageInformation component is a custom UI view designed to display message-related information, such as delivery and read receipts. It serves as an integral part of the CometChat UI UIKit.
The CometChatFormBubble component is used to render a form within a chat list.\nTo learn more about this component tap here
The CometChatCardBubble component is used to display a card within a chat list. To learn more about this component tap here.
The CometChatSchedulerBubble component is used to display a event scheduler within a chat list. To learn more about this component tap here.
